channel.title: Looking for staff - read thread - starting fresh
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm looking to start up a server again, 24/7 hosted by myself and owner by myself, although i am looking for fully dedicated staff and a pair of coders whom also must be dedicated, 317, open to ideas, looking for 3 mods, 2 admins, 2 coders, 1 co owner and one web coder.
i am experienced within rs servers all the way back to 2006/2007, left the ordeal for about 16 months now im looking to get back in to it, seeing as things has changed over those 18 months i will need staff who know how things work now! i can code a little bit with 317 and up to 518, i can wed code anything you can think of, but i also need a web coder to cover me while i do other things!
I will be hosting the server and also hosting a website dedicated to the server and only to that, both server and web online twenty four hours a day 7 days a week, down time will be because of causes out of my control such as power outages and what not.
Reply to this thread or email me, email can be found through my profile.
Thanks, xSolution.

item.title: Looking for staff - read thread - starting fresh
item.dc:creator: @l2mage_kids l2mage kids
item.description:
@l2mage_kids wrote:

Hello, i’m a pretty decent coder and i’d be glad to help you code a server.

My specialty is oldschool pvp servers, like for example camelot pvp, frostiescape, etc all those old spawn pvp servers.

I’d be happy to help you out, and i can code websites a bit like basic stuff.

I’m very trust worthy and if you want to see a project i’m currently working on add me on skype, i’ll show pictures.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for staff - read thread - starting fresh

item.title: Looking for staff - read thread - starting fresh
item.dc:creator: @xSolution xSolution
item.description:
@xSolution wrote:

I'm interested in applying for moderator and get promoted to admin. Btw is this going to be a remake? If so or if not which revision, source,base is this server going to be pm me or reply. Thanks,

Cameron

We could be doing a rs remake, i was thinking just starting with a blank 317 and build up…

Pking server, remake i’m open to ideas but pm me so we can talk!

-Brandon.

Read full topic
